name: MEGA (itch)
description:
n the far far future, Earth is being attacked by Alien Robots. And no one can stop them except The Robo-Warrior “Mr. Triumph”. But there is a problem… the weapons are heavy and those aliens are fast, so don’t hold a lot of weapons or you will be slow to react. Now go and “Make Earth Great Again”.

Tools used:

  • Unity 2017.2 (+ Cinemachine, TextMesh Pro, Ocias Pixel Art Camera, Prime31 CharacterController2D)
  • VS Code
  • Aseprite
  • Gimp

Assets used:

  • Press Start 2P by Codeman38 (Font)

I had to make the game in only 16 hours so I was only able make one level.
